thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 6 of 108
thread.title: Jessica Smith

author: Jessica Smith
title: Jessica Smith
text: This is a legit site -- it works the same way as the better known Ebates. When you make an online purchase, you start from your TopCashback account and then get a % of your purchase back. I dont like that the payout timeframe is seemingly random and varied depending on the merchant you purchase from. There's no set payout dates like ebates, you can request your money anytime after they show as payable. I made my first purchase in Nov 2016 and my money for that isnt payble until April 2017. At least with ebates, you know exactly when your cashback checks are going to be sent. TopCashback runs several contests and sweepstakes via their website and their Facebook page, thats a fun plus for me.
